basics.name: Kyle Levesque
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the College of Engineering at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2017.

work.summary: Manage data center for University of Hawaii system
highlights:
Oversee and maintain an 8000 square foot data center to ensure quality performance for university 
            staff and co-location customers; routine inspections, inventory management, and installations 
            to support work operations

Planning, drafting, and testing processes for data center equipment, facilities, and systems. 
            Ensuring adherence to safety procedures and maintaining high quality service standards expected 
            by management

Examined customer installations and observed operations to ensure conformance to design and equipment
            specifications

Direct infrastructure monitoring to identify and resolve issues on a statewide network. Diagnosed
            malfunctioning equipment and prepared information for field personnel; ensured complete historical
            documentation of actions and steps performed at the conclusion of jobs

Implemented and supported corporate data systems for routers, switches, servers, and phone systems.
            Configured, installed, tested, and troubleshooted Cisco equipment to upgrade the university network
            infrastructure capabilities

Promoted to lead computer operator in two years and managed 3 student workers in performing work assigned 
            by supervisors
